mapper.select: select post_content, post_id, file_id, tps.id as post_section_id, COALESCE(image_type, 'sub') as image_type, file_origin_name, file_path, file_name, file_size, created_datetime, updated_datetime from tbl_post_section tps left join view_file_post_section_file vfpsf on tps.id = vfpsf.post_section_id where post_id = #{postId}
select count(vfpf.id) from view_file_post_section_file vfpf join tbl_post_section tps on vfpf.post_section_id = tps.id and tps.post_id = #{postId}
